name: SkyBoard
description:
Entry for #altrctrl game jam.

Gameplay:

You fly on the skyboard, and collect bricks (green = 1 points, red = 100 points) to get points. Bricks are procedurally generated during the flight.

https://youtu.be/tK7yffl9eDk

Controls:

keyboard + smartphone -> as input, accelerometer
laptop -> as a screen mirror of android device
